text: Kantrin Igharazibar Gumazamiziba, Moses Osirizir Araziba men puvatɨ. Egha arazir kuram gamigha, Moses Osirizir Arazibar saghon ikia me ovenge. Ezɨ Judaba Moses Osirizir Araziba ikia dagh fo. Egha arazir kuram gamizɨ, God men gara Moses Osirizir Arazibar aven itir akamɨn gɨn ghua men araziba tuisɨsi.
